str2: A primary verb; to be 'cheer'ful, i.e. Calmly happy or well-off; impersonally, especially as salutation, be well.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From hupo and meno; to stay under, i.e. Remain; figuratively, to undergo, i.e. Bear, have fortitude, persevere.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To persist, persevere in, continue steadfast in; I wait upon.
From proseuchomai; prayer; by implication, an oratory.
